QuestData.Title: Slave Labor
QuestData.Description: It will take me some time to break through this barrier and communicate with Nespirah. In the meantime, you can save some of those men that the naga have enslaved in the pits below.$b$b<Duarn produces a length of rope from within his robes.>$b$bThis should come in handy.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Duarn's Rope to save 8 Enslaved Pearl Miners.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $n... although I'm afraid I haven't been nearly as productive as you have.
